reviews.review_text: meh its okay little laggy but okay

Played some time a Grizzly Valley. Just a little, not my genre.  But atmosphere is great anyway. A perfect game which reminds me Slender a little.  Anyway, great concept and vision  The only thing I don't like is quite long session, but that's ok its a genre specific

It's not that its a bad game or anything,  It's slow and gets repetitive after a while and just before you restore your car, oh wait there's another bear!  However if your looking for a cheap game to keep you entertained for a couple hours go for it.
